de.geofencing.system

Class GeofencingSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.geofencing.system.GeofencingSystem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class GeofencingSystem
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represents a GeofencingSystem with an UUID containing registered devices, geofences, their beacons and events. Configuration parameters has to be set in the Configuration
    Author:
    Markus Thral
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String LOCATION_NOT_SET
      Value which is set, if location description of a beacon is not set

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GeofencingSystem()
      Creates GeofencingSystem and creates UUID if not found in configuration

        Returns:
        true if password id correct
        Throws:
        UnauthorizedExcpetion - if password is incorrect
        ConfigurationException - if configuration not found or password not set

      • removeGeofence

        public boolean removeGeofence(int minor)
                       throws NotFoundException
        Removes Geofence form the system
        Parameters:
        minor - Minor of the Geofence
        Returns:
        true if Geofence is removed, false if there are beacons or events left
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - if the Geofence is not found

      • addBeacon

        public boolean addBeacon(SystemBeacon beacon)
                  throws AlreadyExistingException,
                         NotFoundException
        Adds beacon to the Geofence
        Parameters:
        beacon - SystemBeacon to be added
        Returns:
        true if beacon added, false if UUID is not matching with the system
        Throws:
        AlreadyExistingException - if beacon is already existing
        NotFoundException - if Geofence is not existing

        major - Major of the beacon
        Returns:

        Throws:
        NotFoundException - if SystemBeacon is not existing
